effect.sun-moon: Prevents heal bell from curing the Pokémon, whether or not it is in battle.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Prevents heal bell from curing the Pokémon, whether or not it is in battle.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Prevents heal bell from curing the Pokémon, whether or not it is in battle.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Soundproofing of the Pokémon itself gives full immunity to all sound-based moves.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Soundproofing of the Pokémon itself gives full immunity to all sound-based moves.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Soundproofing gives the Pokémon full immunity to all sound-based moves.
